participant_1.name: Brittany
participant_1.personality: Confident and outgoing, she enjoys the finer things in life and is not afraid to spend money on herself.
participant_1.background: i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money. i am high maintenance. i diet a lot. i love listening to britney spears.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Cautious and grounded, he values stability and has a deep love for animals.
participant_2.background: i'm terrified of scorpions. i'm employed by the us postal service. i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar.
